summary: A space shuttle crashes containing a lethal prototype organism designed to survive in any environment. The only people who can stop the creature are the Secretary of Defense agent and the female scientist who created it.
cast: Patrick Muldoon|Theresa Russell|Curtis Armstrong|Joe Avalon|John Beck|James Cromwell|Tamara Davies|Lydie Denier|Redmond Gleeson|Daniel Quinn|Steve J. Hennessy|Billy Keane|Todd Kimsey|Adam Koster|Rod McCary|Lorissa McComas|Andy Milder|William Monroe|Paul Preston|Steve Purnick|Rene Rivera|Eamonn Roche|Joe Sabatino|Geoff Stults|Tim Thomerson|Eric James Virgets|William Langlois|GiGi Erneta|Adam Lieberman|Dwayne L. Shattuck
keywords: outer space|shootout|exploding car|murder of a police officer|jail
title: Proyecto V.I.P.E.R.
